Uses of Interface
org.jogger.http.Request

Packages that use Request
org.jogger Contains API interfaces and the JoggerServlet 
org.jogger.http.servlet An implementation of Jogger's HTTP request/response API that uses the Servlet API underneath. 
org.jogger.support Some helper classes that provide common functionality to other internal classes. 
org.jogger.test The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications.

          This method is called when a matching request is received.
